text:
Giant Otter Technologies | Frontend Engineer (React JS), Full Stack Engineer | Boston, MA | Full-time | Onsite | https://www.giantotter.com

Giant Otter is building on a proprietary natural language AI architecture to automate coaching for sales and support conversations

Check out our job postings & apply here https://angel.co/giant-otter-technologies/jobs

Interview process is phone screen, <0.5 day onsite interviews with future team members, short (untimed) coding exercise
